param.name: pCount
param.para: A pointer to the item count.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a specified conflict data item.

param.name: iIndex
param.para: The index of the conflict item to retrieve.

param.name: pItemInfo
param.para: When this method returns successfully, contains a pointer to a structure that contains information about the conflict.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that get conflict item data and item count.
